plays.text: Goal scored by Martin Havlat assisted by Peter Schaefer AND Antoine Vermette
Penalty to Bryan Smolinski 2 minutes for Tripping Dan Boyle
Penalty to Paul Ranger 2 minutes for Hooking Chris Kelly
Goal scored by Daniel Alfredsson assisted by Dany Heatley AND Wade Redden
Penalty to Mike Fisher 2 minutes for Charging Nick Tarnasky
Goal scored by Brad Richards assisted by Martin St. Louis AND Vaclav Prospal
Penalty to Bryan Smolinski 2 minutes for Hooking Ruslan Fedotenko
Penalty to Andrej Meszaros 2 minutes for Hooking Dmitry Afanasenkov
Penalty to Chris Phillips 2 minutes for Interference Dave Andreychuk
Penalty to Zdeno Chara 2 minutes for Hooking Vaclav Prospal
Goal scored by Vincent Lecavalier assisted by Vaclav Prospal AND Martin St. Louis
Goal scored by Wade Redden assisted by Daniel Alfredsson AND Jason Spezza
Goal scored by Mike Fisher unassisted
Penalty to Dominik Hasek 2 minutes for Interference Rob DiMaio served by Bryan Smolinski
Penalty to Pavel Kubina 2 minutes for High Sticking Martin Havlat
